title: ISplitLineFeatureData.IGetFaces
description: Gets the faces split by the split line.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of split faces VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISplitLineFeatureData::GetFacesCount
to determine the size of the array for this method.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
